p: Consistent with previous analysis, WHO also concluded "to date, there is no specific medicine recommended to prevent or treat SARS-CoV-2" 37. TCM has been used in control of infectious diseases for thousands of years. There is a clear room for the intervention of TCM as a complementary therapy for COVID-19 patients. It is reported that the patients with SARS-CoV infection have benefited from TCM treatment 38, including amelioration of side effect of conventional therapeutics 39, 40. Based on these factors, there is a general expectation that TCM would be a valuable weapon in the armory against SARS-CoV-2.
